original_text: When Jacob was speaking to the shepherds, Rachel arrived there. She brought her father's sheep with her. She was taking care of them.
korean_text: 야곱이 그들과 말하는 동안에 라헬이 그의 아버지의 양과 함께 오니 그가 그의 양들을 치고 있었기 때문이더라

sentences.original_text: When Jacob was speaking to the shepherds
She brought her father's sheep with her
She was taking care of them
